author: slehti
body:
#### PR description:
Solution to JIRA ticket CMSHLT-2764
https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2764

DQM plots empty due to hlt paths not existing any more in the hlt menu. Replaced paths in
HLTObjectMonitor
    HLT_PFMET110_PFMHT110_IDTight -> HLT_PFMET120_PFMHT120_IDTight
HLTObjectsMonitor_EXO
    HLT_PFMET110_PFMHT110_IDTight -> HLT_PFMET120_PFMHT120_IDTight
    HLT_PFMETNoMu110_PFMHTNoMu110_IDTight -> HLT_PFMETNoMu120_PFMHTNoMu120_IDTight
to existing ones.

scram b runtests: pass

Not yet tested.
title: Dqm hlt object monitor met path update
